cards.name: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon
cards.text:
[+2]: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon deals 3 damage to any target.
[−X]: Exile each permanent with mana value X or less that's one or more colors.
[−10]: You gain 7 life, draw seven cards, then put up to seven permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Alpine Watchdog
cards.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
cards.flavor:
"On the eighth day, a blizzard hit. Supplies were lost, and morale plummeted. On the ninth day, Dover found us."
-To the Summit: A Tale of Survival

cards.name: Angelic Ascension
cards.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Its controller creates a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
cards.flavor: Within her battalion she was known as the Angel of Arkvale. Until now, that was only a metaphor.

cards.name: Anointed Chorister
cards.text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
{4}{W}: Anointed Chorister gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "I sing of benevolence and mercy, of golden wings bringing comfort to the meek and downtrodden."

cards.name: Aven Gagglemaster
cards.text:
Flying
When Aven Gagglemaster enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature you control with flying.
cards.flavor: An aven's gear is enchanted to avoid weighing them down during aerial maneuvers.

cards.name: Baneslayer Angel
cards.text: Flying, first strike, lifelink, protection from Demons and from Dragons
cards.flavor: Some angels protect the meek and innocent. Others seek out and smite evil wherever it lurks.

cards.name: Basri Ket
cards.text:
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn.
[−2]: Whenever one or more nontoken creatures attack this turn, create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.
[−6]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control."

cards.name: Basri's Acolyte
cards.text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
When Basri's Acolyte enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures you control.
cards.flavor: Basri carries on his god's legacy, spreading her teachings throughout the Multiverse.

cards.name: Basri's Lieutenant
cards.text:
Vigilance, protection from multicolored
When Basri's Lieutenant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Whenever Basri's Lieutenant or another creature you control dies, if it had a +1/+1 counter on it, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

cards.name: Basri's Solidarity
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
cards.flavor:
"The will to fight and act as one is not limited to a single world. Oketra's teachings are universal."
-Basri Ket

cards.name: Celestial Enforcer
cards.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature. Activate only if you control a creature with flying.
cards.flavor: "I look to the heavens for hope, but you will kneel."

cards.name: Concordia Pegasus
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: In the cloudy skies and dim light of autumn, a flash of white wings is a reminder that better times lie ahead.

cards.name: Containment Priest
cards.text:
Flash
If a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.
cards.flavor: Some protection requires a bit of finesse.

cards.name: Daybreak Charger
cards.text: When Daybreak Charger enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: It's often mistaken for the coming dawn as it gallops across the horizon.

cards.name: Defiant Strike
cards.text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "My family was saved thanks to a single Boros soldier. It's why I joined the Legion. I will be the protector now."

cards.name: Dub
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and is a Knight in addition to its other types. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
cards.flavor: "Rise, knight of New Benalia."

cards.name: Faith's Fetters
cards.text:
Enchant permanent
When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

cards.name: Falconer Adept
cards.text: Whenever Falconer Adept attacks, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking.
cards.flavor: "My falcons are family, as much as any other member of my clan."

cards.name: Feat of Resistance
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)

cards.name: Gale Swooper
cards.text:
Flying
When Gale Swooper enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Be glad the griffin set you back on your feet when it was done with you. My goat wasn't so lucky."
-Arram, goatherd

cards.name: Glorious Anthem
cards.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: The songs of angels are perceived not as words in the ears but as stirrings in the soul.

cards.name: Griffin Aerie
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.
cards.flavor: When griffins started nesting atop the northern tower, the castellan worried they'd be a nuisance. Instead, they took the entire castle under their protection.

cards.name: Idol of Endurance
cards.text:
When Idol of Endurance enters the battlefield, exile all creature cards with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard until Idol of Endurance leaves the battlefield.
{1}{W}, {T}: Until end of turn, you may cast a creature spell from among cards exiled with Idol of Endurance without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Legion's Judgment
cards.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
cards.flavor: "My lance was once wielded by Venerable Tarrian. In his name and by his might, I cast you down!"

cards.name: Light of Promise
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature."
cards.flavor: The light washed over him, and in the wind he heard the roars of all the pridemates who had come before.

cards.name: Makeshift Battalion
cards.text: Whenever Makeshift Battalion and at least two other creatures attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Makeshift Battalion.
cards.flavor: Their ranks are thin, their formation is improvised, their weapons are borrowed, and you'd best get out of their way.

cards.name: Mangara, the Diplomat
cards.text:
Lifelink
Whenever an opponent attacks with creatures, if two or more of those creatures are attacking you and/or planeswalkers you control, draw a card.
Whenever an opponent casts their second spell each turn, draw a card.

cards.name: Nine Lives
cards.text:
Hexproof
If a source would deal damage to you, prevent that damage and put an incarnation counter on Nine Lives.
When there are nine or more incarnation counters on Nine Lives, exile it.
When Nine Lives leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

cards.name: Pack Leader
cards.text:
Other Dogs you control get +1/+1.
Whenever Pack Leader attacks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn to Dogs you control.
cards.flavor: He will be your loyal champion, and his pack your protectors. All he asks for is a full belly, a spot by the fire, and all the love in your heart.

cards.name: Rambunctious Mutt
cards.text: When Rambunctious Mutt enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.
cards.flavor: Emphatic words with powerful gestures. Clearly this was playtime.

cards.name: Revitalize
cards.text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"A potion is no substitute for a skilled surgeon, but it will hold your bits in."
-Torricks, battlefield medic

cards.name: Runed Halo
cards.text:
As Runed Halo enters the battlefield, choose a card name.
You have protection from the chosen card name. (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything with that name.)

cards.name: Sanctum of Tranquil Light
cards.text: {5}{W}: Tap target creature. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each Shrine you control.
cards.flavor:
An untroubled mind
Dwells in perfect harmony
With a peaceful heart.

cards.name: Seasoned Hallowblade
cards.text: Discard a card: Tap Seasoned Hallowblade. It gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
cards.flavor: "I don't know that I'll win every fight. But I have faith, and that's carried me this far."

cards.name: Secure the Scene
cards.text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
cards.flavor:
"You know it's a great show when the Azorius arrest the props, too!"
-Judith, the Scourge Diva

cards.name: Selfless Savior
cards.text: Sacrifice Selfless Savior: Another target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
cards.flavor: She raised him from an orphaned pup and gave him a life of love. With his last act, he thanked her.

cards.name: Siege Striker
cards.text:
Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
Whenever Siege Striker attacks, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Siege Striker gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature tapped this way.

cards.name: Speaker of the Heavens
cards.text:
Vigilance, lifelink
{T}: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying. Activate only if you have at least 7 life more than your starting life total and only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor: "All are welcome in the angels' light."

cards.name: Staunch Shieldmate
cards.flavor: "Gilded with gold from a dragon's trove, it is! And etched with the image of the dragon I slew to take it."

cards.name: Swift Response
cards.text: Destroy target tapped creature.
cards.flavor:
"There's nothing quite as satisfying as delivering a good kick to the face."
-Adrasteia, Akroan captain

cards.name: Tempered Veteran
cards.text:
{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{4}{W}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
cards.flavor: "I've been carrying a sword since before you were born. I wouldn't give up my oath for all the peace and comfort in the world."

cards.name: Valorous Steed
cards.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
When Valorous Steed enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
cards.flavor: A unicorn chooses only the most virtuous and noble of knights to be its companion.

cards.name: Vryn Wingmare
cards.text:
Flying
Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
cards.flavor: It's the favored mount of military commanders as well as anyone with a flair for the dramatic.

cards.name: Warded Battlements
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.
cards.flavor: In dire times, even a place of refuge can become a weapon of war.

cards.name: Barrin, Tolarian Archmage
cards.text:
When Barrin, Tolarian Archmage enters the battlefield, return up to one other target creature or planeswalker to its owner's hand.
At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent was put into your hand from the battlefield this turn, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "There is no age at which you stop learning."

foreignPrintings.name: トレイリアの大魔導師、バリン

cards.name: Cancel
cards.text: Counter target spell.
cards.flavor: "I decide what stands in my way."

cards.name: Capture Sphere
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
When Capture Sphere enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

cards.name: Discontinuity
cards.text:
As long as it's your turn, this spell costs {2}{U}{U} less to cast.
End the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack, including this card. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

cards.name: Enthralling Hold
cards.text:
Enchant creature
You can't choose an untapped creature as this spell's target as you cast it.
You control enchanted creature.
cards.flavor:
"I offered to pay him to do the job, but he refused. So I took matters into my own hands."
-Tahim, the Puppetmaster

cards.name: Frantic Inventory
cards.text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Frantic Inventory in your graveyard.
cards.flavor: "Another village, another angry mob. Why do I even bother unpacking?"

cards.name: Frost Breath
cards.text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
cards.flavor: "I'll make ice chimes of your bones."

cards.name: Ghostly Pilferer
cards.text:
Whenever Ghostly Pilferer becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell from anywhere other than their hand, draw a card.
Discard a card: Ghostly Pilferer can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Jeskai Elder
cards.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Jeskai Elder deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

cards.name: Keen Glidemaster
cards.text: {2}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Fear is a rational response, but waiting won't make it any easier. Just jump!"

cards.name: Library Larcenist
cards.text: Whenever Library Larcenist attacks, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "I specialize in missing manuscripts, pilfered poetry, and lifted letters."

cards.name: Lofty Denial
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. If you control a creature with flying, counter that spell unless its controller pays {4} instead.
cards.flavor: The mage scowled as yet another bolt splashed harmlessly against seemingly empty air.

cards.name: Miscast
cards.text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {3}.
cards.flavor:
"Next time, try something more appropriate for your skill level."
-Barrin, Tolarian archmage

cards.name: Mistral Singer
cards.text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: "I sang of storms, there came a squall. I sang of waves, the seas grew tall. I sang of love, but no voice called."

cards.name: Opt
cards.text:
Scry 1.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: The crystal pulsed with the power of Teferi's planeswalker spark. Had Jhoira given him a blessing or a curse?

cards.name: Pursued Whale
cards.text:
When Pursued Whale enters the battlefield, each opponent creates a 1/1 red Pirate creature token with "This creature can't block" and "Creatures you control attack each combat if able."
Spells your opponents cast that target Pursued Whale cost {3} more to cast.

cards.name: Rain of Revelation
cards.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: "As the sky opened up, we ran for shelter. Halfway there I came to the sudden realization that, already soaked, there might be more to gain from experiencing the rain than running from it."

cards.name: Read the Tides
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Draw three cards.
• Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
cards.flavor: Charts and instruments work fine, but the best navigators aren't above a spell or two to nudge the tides in a more favorable direction.

cards.name: Rewind
cards.text: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.
cards.flavor: "The best denials are simply that: a beginning and end unchanged, a dream with no memory."

cards.name: Riddleform
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may have Riddleform become a 3/3 Sphinx creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn.
{2}{U}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Roaming Ghostlight
cards.text:
Flying
When Roaming Ghostlight enters the battlefield, return up to one target non-Spirit creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Some who die senseless deaths return as formless spirits, seeking answers where there are none.

cards.name: Rookie Mistake
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and another target creature gets -2/-0.
cards.flavor: "Stop locking your knees as you strike! Now stand up and try again."

cards.name: Rousing Read
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Rousing Read enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.
cards.flavor: Great literature can transport the reader.

cards.name: Sanctum of Calm Waters
cards.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, you may draw X cards, where X is the number of Shrines you control. If you do, discard a card.
cards.flavor:
Truth lurks in the depths,
Invisible from the shore.
Knowledge inundates.

cards.name: See the Truth
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. If this spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand, put each of those cards into your hand instead.
cards.flavor: "What is this that is neither future nor past?"

cards.name: Shacklegeist
cards.text:
Flying
Shacklegeist can block only creatures with flying.
Tap two untapped Spirits you control: Tap target creature you don't control.
cards.flavor: The Blessed Sleep doesn't come easily to a mind chained by regrets.

cards.name: Shipwreck Dowser
cards.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Shipwreck Dowser enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Lost at sea doesn't have to mean lost forever.

cards.name: Spined Megalodon
cards.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Whenever Spined Megalodon attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Stormwing Entity
cards.text:
This spell costs {2}{U} less to cast if you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Stormwing Entity enters the battlefield, scry 2.

cards.name: Sublime Epiphany
cards.text:
Choose one or more -
• Counter target spell.
• Counter target activated or triggered ability.
• Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
• Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
• Target player draws a card.

cards.name: Teferi, Master of Time
cards.text:
You may activate loyalty abilities of Teferi, Master of Time on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant.
[+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card.
[−3]: Target creature you don't control phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)
[−10]: Take two extra turns after this one.

foreignPrintings.name: 時の支配者、テフェリー

cards.name: Teferi's Ageless Insight
cards.text: If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead.
cards.flavor:
"Fine, you know more than me. But do you have to be such a show-off about it?"
-Chandra Nalaar, to Teferi

foreignPrintings.name: テフェリーの永遠の洞察

cards.name: Teferi's Protege
cards.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: Teferi's legacy lives on in Tolaria through the study of time magic and a tradition of irrepressible mischief.

cards.name: Teferi's Tutelage
cards.text:
When Teferi's Tutelage enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you draw a card, target opponent mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
cards.flavor: "Tarassel's sixth law of temporal recursion is easy to understand as long as you know the first seven."

cards.name: Tide Skimmer
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you attack with two or more creatures with flying, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Fishing boats often follow hunting drakes to find the largest schools of fish.

cards.name: Tolarian Kraken
cards.text: Whenever you draw a card, you may pay {1}. When you do, you may tap or untap target creature.
cards.flavor:
"It's contemplative, resourceful, and original. Everything else aside, it's the perfect student."
-Naban, dean of iteration

foreignPrintings.name: トレイリアのクラーケン

cards.name: Tome Anima
cards.text: Tome Anima can't be blocked as long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn.
cards.flavor: Sometimes knowledge takes on a life of its own.

cards.name: Unsubstantiate
cards.text: Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Nicely done, Jace. You always were good at disappearing acts."
-Liliana Vess

cards.name: Vodalian Arcanist
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.
cards.flavor: The Vodalian Empire tends to be insular. The scholarly Volshe caste are the exception, using education as an antidote to xenophobia.

foreignPrintings.name: ヴォーデイリアの秘儀術師

cards.name: Waker of Waves
cards.text:
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.
{1}{U}, Discard Waker of Waves: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
cards.flavor: On the open sea, there is nowhere to hide.

cards.name: Wall of Runes
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Wall of Runes enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Wishcoin Crab
cards.flavor:
"What wishes do they grant? Mostly pinching-related ones."
-Omik, superintendent of waterworks

cards.name: Alchemist's Gift
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains your choice of deathtouch or lifelink until end of turn. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it. Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

cards.name: Archfiend's Vessel
cards.text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
When Archfiend's Vessel enters the battlefield, if it entered from your graveyard or you cast it from your graveyard, exile it. If you do, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.

cards.name: Bad Deal
cards.text: You draw two cards and each opponent discards two cards. Each player loses 2 life.
cards.flavor: There are still places where a smile and a handshake are all you need to seal a deal.

cards.name: Blood Glutton
cards.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: "Some savor the hunt. I savor the kill."

cards.name: Caged Zombie
cards.text: {1}{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 2 life. Activate only if a creature died this turn.
cards.flavor: "Six consecutive life sentences" takes on a new meaning when necromancy is involved.

cards.name: Carrion Grub
cards.text:
Carrion Grub gets +X/+0, where X is the greatest power among creature cards in your graveyard.
When Carrion Grub enters the battlefield, mill four cards. (Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Crypt Lurker
cards.text: When Crypt Lurker enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature or discard a creature card. If you do, draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Even the rats refuse to set foot inside. I fear to think what might be waiting in there."
-Gravedigger's journal

cards.name: Deathbloom Thallid
cards.text: When Deathbloom Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
cards.flavor:
"Nature is not always gentle or kind, but all life begets life."
-Marwyn of Llanowar

cards.name: Demonic Embrace
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+1, has flying, and is a Demon in addition to its other types.
You may cast Demonic Embrace from your graveyard by paying 3 life and discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs.

cards.name: Duress
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor: Resistance is unthinkable.

cards.name: Eliminate
cards.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.
cards.flavor:
"Cruelty? No. This is necessity."
-Kaervek

cards.name: Fetid Imp
cards.text:
Flying
{B}: Fetid Imp gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.name: Finishing Blow
cards.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
cards.flavor: "In this world, it's kill or be killed. I'd rather not be the latter."

cards.name: Gloom Sower
cards.text: Whenever Gloom Sower becomes blocked by a creature, that creature's controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor:
"First, the darkness fell. Terror came next. After that, only despair remained."
-The Tragedy of Morein

cards.name: Goremand
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Flying
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
When Goremand enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

cards.name: Grasp of Darkness
cards.text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"I welcome the use of even the foulest magic if it will rid us of the monstrosities that plague our world."
-Munda, ambush leader

cards.name: Grim Tutor
cards.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle. You lose 3 life.
cards.flavor: As blood touched the empty page, it formed words that seared themselves into the wizard's mind.

cards.name: Hooded Blightfang
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals damage to a planeswalker, destroy that planeswalker.

cards.name: Infernal Scarring
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
cards.flavor: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.

cards.name: Kaervek, the Spiteful
cards.text: Other creatures get -1/-1.
cards.flavor: "Defy me and I will burn the flesh from your bones. Betray me and I will steal the breath from your lungs."

foreignPrintings.name: 悪意に満ちた者、ケアヴェク

cards.name: Kitesail Freebooter
cards.text:
Flying
When Kitesail Freebooter enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. Exile that card until Kitesail Freebooter leaves the battlefield.

cards.name: Liliana, Waker of the Dead
cards.text:
[+1]: Each player discards a card. Each opponent who can't loses 3 life.
[−3]: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.
[−7]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste."

foreignPrintings.name: 死者を目覚めさせる者、リリアナ

cards.name: Liliana's Devotee
cards.text:
Zombies you control get +1/+0.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.flavor: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.

cards.name: Track Down
cards.text: Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature or land card, draw a card. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
cards.flavor: Scents fade and footprints wash away, but some trails can never be erased.

cards.name: Trufflesnout
cards.text:
When Trufflesnout enters the battlefield, choose one -
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Trufflesnout.
• You gain 4 life.
cards.flavor: Its exploits are the stuff of legends among local chefs and fuel for nightmares among the forest thallids.

cards.name: Warden of the Woods
cards.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Whenever Warden of the Woods becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw two cards.
cards.flavor: Weak and strong alike seek shelter beneath its branches.

cards.name: Wildwood Scourge
cards.text:
Wildwood Scourge enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on another non-Hydra creature you control, put a +1/+1 counter on Wildwood Scourge.

cards.name: Alpine Houndmaster
cards.text:
When Alpine Houndmaster enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Alpine Watchdog and/or a card named Igneous Cur, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever Alpine Houndmaster attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of other attacking creatures.

cards.name: Conclave Mentor
cards.text:
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on that creature instead.
When Conclave Mentor dies, you gain life equal to its power.
cards.flavor: "I have faith in your potential."

cards.name: Dire Fleet Warmonger
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Dire Fleet Warmonger gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

cards.name: Experimental Overload
cards.text: Create an X/X blue and red Weird creature token, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. Then you may return an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Experimental Overload.
cards.flavor: Explosions aren't necessarily failures, just a different kind of success.

cards.name: Indulging Patrician
cards.text:
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, each opponent loses 3 life.
cards.flavor: "Just a nibble for now. I wouldn't want to ruin my appetite."

cards.name: Leafkin Avenger
cards.text:
{T}: Add {G} for each creature with power 4 or greater you control.
{7}{R}: Leafkin Avenger deals damage equal to its power to target player or planeswalker.
cards.flavor: "My roots are ash, my heart a smoldering ember. What I could not protect, I will avenge."

cards.name: Lorescale Coatl

cards.flavor:
"The enlightenment I never found in etherium I have found traced in the coatl's scales."
-Ranalus, vedalken heretic

cards.name: Prismite

[−8]: Discard your hand, then draw seven cards. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
